title.en: The keyboard sounds of "Haunted By Silhouettes - Selkie"

content.no:
Keyboardlydene fra bridge-delen i låta Selkie av Haunted By Silhouettes & Bjorn "Speed" Strid.
Instrumenter som er brukt: Korg MS-20 kontrollert av Korg CX-3 med External Signal Processing (ESP), Louis Zwicki Pianette, Sequential Circuits Pro-One, Mellotron M4000D innspilt på 4-spors kassett med Fostex X-28H og Hammond C3 med Leslie 122.
Instrumenter som er brukt ellers i låta: Dreadbox Erebus v2 og Korg Polysix.
content.en:
The keyboard sounds from the bridge part of the song Selkie by Haunted By Silhouettes & Bjorn "Speed" Strid.
Instruments used: Korg MS-20 controlled by Korg CX-3 with External Signal Processing (ESP), Louis Zwicki Pianette, Sequential Circuits Pro-One, Mellotron M4000D recorded to 4-track casette tape with Fostex X-28H and Hammond C3 with Leslie 122.
Instruments used elsewhere in the track: Dreadbox Erebus v2 and Korg Polysix.

title.no: Synth-solo i 5/4 med Pro-One gjennom en gitarforsterker
title.en: Synth solo in 5/4 with Pro-One through a guitar amp

content.no:
Synth solo i 5/4 taktart med Sequential Circuits Pro-One synthesizer gjennom en Vox AC15H1TV forsterker.
Instrument: Sequential Circuits Pro-One.
Effekter: Fulltone Tube Tape Echo og Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978.
Forsterker: Vox AC15H1TV.
Mikrofon: Shure SM57.
content.en:
Synth solo in 5/4 time signature with Sequential Circuits Pro-One synthesizer through a Vox AC15H1TV amplifier.
Instrument: Sequential Circuits Pro-One.
Effects: Fulltone Tube Tape Echo and Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978.
Amplifier: Vox AC15H1TV.
Microphone: Shure SM57.

thumbnailDescription: A Sequential Circuits Pro-One synthesizer being played

content.no:
Spiller inn Wurlitzer 200A elektrisk piano med en kontaktmikrofon (piezo pickup) for å fremheve mekanisk støy fra tangentene og sustain-pedalen. Signalet fra kontaktmikrofonen er så mikset inn med direktesignalet.
Jeg la også på litt romklang fra Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978 og spilte det inn på kassett for litt ekstra farging.
Instrument: Wurlitzer 200A.
Klang: Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978.
Båndopptaker: Fostex X-28H.
content.en:
Recording the Wurlitzer 200A electric piano with a contact mic (piezo pickup) to capture the mechanical noise from the keys and sustain pedal. The signal from the contact mic is then blended in with the direct signal.
I also added a bit of room reverb from the Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978 and recorded it to a cassette tape for some extra color and saturation.
Instrument: Wurlitzer 200A.
Reverb: Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978.
Tape recorder: Fostex X-28H.

thumbnailDescription: A Wurlitzer 200A electric piano being played

name.no: Miks med klang spilt inn på kassett
name.en: Mix with reverb recorded to cassette tape
